Hi, I'm Chris Lessard.

I'm a third year student at the University of Toronto pursuing my B.Sc. in Computer Science, with particular interests in systems programming, data analytics and machine learning.

I'm a developer and a tech enthusiast, with long running interests in media, art, music and education.

Editor + Webmaster

Review of Undergraduate Computer Science

I work as a webmaster and editor for RUCS, a publication of the best undergraduate research in Computer Science done at the University of Toronto.

Developer

The Beer Store Api

I wrote a RESTful API to help programmers access The Beer Store's database.

Learning better and using Vim
